contents: Article 9-2 (Meeting Minutes) ① The chairperson shall record the following matters in the meeting minutes and keep them with the signatures of all attending members. 1. Meeting date, place, and agenda 2. List of attendees and attendees 3. Deliberation agenda, resolution details 4. Other necessary matters ② The chairperson shall summarize and disclose the contents of the meeting minutes in Paragraph 1. However, the committee may not disclose the meeting minutes by resolution for a specific matter by specifying the reason. [This article was newly established on December 27, 2021]
